definition: to assail or attack on all sides
details:
verb
- to assail or attack on all sides
= example: to assail or attack on all sides
- to decorate or cover lavishly, as with gems
= example: to decorate or cover lavishly, as with gems
= synonyms: encrust
- to annoy continually or chronically
= example: to annoy continually or chronically
= synonyms: hassle
